# Generate Animated Human Videos from Images & Audio with Bytedance Omni Human

Built with **n8n + Replicate**

This workflow takes an **image** + **audio**, sends them to Bytedance‚Äôs **omni-human model**, waits for processing, and returns a generated video.

---

## ‚ö° Section 1: Start & Authenticate

* **‚ñ∂Ô∏è On clicking ‚Äòexecute‚Äô** ‚Üí Manual trigger to start the workflow.
* **üîë Set API Key** ‚Üí Stores your Replicate API key so future requests are authorized.

**Benefit:** Secures your API credentials in one place for easy re-use.

---

## üõ†Ô∏è Section 2: Send Video Generation Request

* **üì° Create Prediction** ‚Üí Makes a POST request to Replicate with:

  * `image`: input image URL
  * `audio`: input audio URL
  * Model version: `7ec44f5140c7338b3496cbf99ee8ea391a4bc18ff5d1677a146dfc936a91f65b`

**Benefit:** Combines visual and audio inputs to start AI-powered video generation.

---

## üîç Section 3: Track the Prediction

* **üì¶ Extract Prediction ID** ‚Üí Saves `predictionId`, `status`, and `predictionUrl` for polling.
* **‚è≥ Wait** ‚Üí Pauses 2 seconds between status checks (to avoid spamming the API).
* **üîÅ Check Prediction Status** ‚Üí Queries Replicate using the stored prediction URL.
* **‚úÖ Check If Complete** ‚Üí Branches:

  * If status = `succeeded` ‚Üí move forward.
  * Else ‚Üí loop back to **Wait** until completion.

**Benefit:** Ensures workflow patiently waits for the video instead of timing out.

---

## üìΩÔ∏è Section 4: Process & Return Results

* **üì¶ Process Result** ‚Üí Cleans the API response, returning:

  * `status`
  * `video_url` (generated video)
  * `metrics`
  * `created_at` & `completed_at`
  * `model: bytedance/omni-human`

**Benefit:** Gives you a neat, structured output with the generated video link ready to use.

---

## üìä Workflow Overview

| Section             | Purpose                     | Key Nodes                                     | Benefit                          |
| ------------------- | --------------------------- | --------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------- |
| ‚ö° Start & Auth      | Initialize & secure API key | Manual Trigger, Set API Key                   | Keeps credentials safe           |
| üõ†Ô∏è Send Request    | Start video generation      | Create Prediction                             | Submits image+audio to Replicate |
| üîç Track Prediction | Poll status until done      | Extract Prediction ID, Wait, Check Status, If | Reliable async handling          |
| üìΩÔ∏è Process Result  | Format output               | Process Result                                | Easy access to final video link  |

---

## ‚úÖ Final Benefits

* üé¨ Turns static **image + audio** into full **AI-generated video**.
* üîë API key stored securely in workflow.
* üîÑ Handles async generation with auto-polling.
* üì§ Outputs clean JSON with direct video link.
* üß© Modular ‚Äî you can connect results to Slack, Gmail, or Google Drive for auto-sharing.

---

## üõ†Ô∏è Section 2: Send Video Generation Request

* **üì° Create Prediction** ‚Üí Makes a POST request to Replicate with:

  * `image`: input image URL
  * `audio`: input audio URL
  * Model version: `7ec44f5140c7338b3496cbf99ee8ea391a4bc18ff5d1677a146dfc936a91f65b`

**Benefit:** Combines visual and audio inputs to start AI-powered video generation.

---

## üîç Section 3: Track the Prediction

* **üì¶ Extract Prediction ID** ‚Üí Saves `predictionId`, `status`, and `predictionUrl` for polling.
* **‚è≥ Wait** ‚Üí Pauses 2 seconds between status checks (to avoid spamming the API).
* **üîÅ Check Prediction Status** ‚Üí Queries Replicate using the stored prediction URL.
* **‚úÖ Check If Complete** ‚Üí Branches:

  * If status = `succeeded` ‚Üí move forward.
  * Else ‚Üí loop back to **Wait** until completion.

**Benefit:** Ensures workflow patiently waits for the video instead of timing out.

---

## üìΩÔ∏è Section 4: Process & Return Results

* **üì¶ Process Result** ‚Üí Cleans the API response, returning:

  * `status`
  * `video_url` (generated video)
  * `metrics`
  * `created_at` & `completed_at`
  * `model: bytedance/omni-human`

**Benefit:** Gives you a neat, structured output with the generated video link ready to use.

---
